locations.name: Cairo
locations.description: Egypt's sprawling capital, the starting point of the tour, known for the Giza Pyramids and the Egyptian Museum.

locations.name: Aswan (Nile Cruise Embarkation)
locations.description: Southern city where travelers board the Nile cruise ship for the journey north. The cruise ship serves as accommodation from this point.

locations.name: Luxor
locations.description: City where travelers disembark the Nile cruise and stay overnight. Renowned for the Valley of the Kings, Karnak, and Luxor Temples.

locations.name: Hurghada
locations.description: Coastal resort city on the Red Sea, the final destination for relaxation, beach activities, and exploring marine life.
